## PopulatedEthersBeraBorrowTransaction class

A transaction that has been prepared for sending.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PopulatedEthersBeraBorrowTransaction<T = unknown> implements PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction<EthersPopulatedTransaction, SentEthersBeraBorrowTransaction<T>> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [PopulatedBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-base.populatedberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersPopulatedTransaction](./lib-ethers.etherspopulatedtransaction.md)<!-- -->, [SentEthersBeraBorrowTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersberaborrowtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Returned by [PopulatableEthersBeraBorrow](./lib-ethers.populatableethersberaborrow.md) functions.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `PopulatedEthersBeraBorrowTransaction` class.

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [gasHeadroom?](./lib-ethers.populatedethersberaborrowtransaction.gasheadroom.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Extra gas added to the transaction's <code>gasLimit</code> on top of the estimated minimum requirement. |
